description:
11.109 gblur
Apply Gaussian blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: gblur

options.description: Set horizontal sigma, standard deviation of Gaussian blur. Default is 0.5.
options.name: sigma

options.description: Set number of steps for Gaussian approximation. Default is 1.
options.name: steps

options.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set vertical sigma, if negative it will be same as sigma. Default is -1.
options.name: sigmaV
